song_lyrics: Sukh antare re sant sāchā bhogve re,
Jem sājo jame re sundar sukhḍī re,
Chandannī vāse re ali almast chhe re,
Makshikā dekhī rahe chhe dūr re;
Goḷnu gāḍu re gīgāne game nahi re,
Jene prīt purīsh shu bharpūr re... sukh 1
Kumudinī kedī re na pāme sukh sūrthī re,
Chakvā kedī chadra na chā’y re;
Ghaṇu ajvāḷu re ghuḍne game nahi re,
Em sant asantnī re jāṇo ruchī jūjvī re,
Sant bhaje taje tene asant re;
Nishkuḷānand re nakkī e vārtā re,
Samjī levu evu siddhant re... sukh 3
title: Sukh antare re sant sāchā bhogve re

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-727: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Sant Mahima Pad
